Patients ST elevation myocardial infarction ( symptom onset < 12 hour ) , undergo primary percutaneous coronary intervention , antiplatelet naïve ( Group A ) present high residual PR ( define PRU ≥ 208 ) immediately primary percutaneous coronary intervention , randomize informed consent , 1:1 ratio either : Ticagrelor 180mg loading dose ( LD ) , follow 90mg x2 maintenance dose ( MD ) start 12±6 hour post LD Or Ticagrelor 360mg load dose ( LD ) , follow 90mg x2 maintenance dose ( MD ) start 12±6 hour post LD Platelet reactivity assessment perform randomization ( Hour 0 ) 0.5 , 1 , 2 , 4 hour randomization , use VerifyNow assay , platelet reactivity unit ( PRU ) .
